name: Save The World (itch) (Ydalict)
description:
Greetings pilot !

I'm not going to lie, the situation is critical. Thousands of meteors are coming at us !

Although the future of humanity is uncertain, we have to try our best to stay alive, but we don't have any missile anymore destroy those meteors. But we have spaceships with shields !

So get in, hit them and get them off our planet !

The game was made in 2 days by a team of 8 people during the 2020 Global Game Jam ! 

The theme of the jam was "Save the world, not youself"

It was the first game jam for the most of us, so it was a pleasure to discover that thrilling feeling during the event !

Hope you will enjoy the game ! Have fun !

Inputs :

Mouse Move  -> Spaceship orientation

Z/S -> Rotate shields forward/backward

Q/D -> Rotate shields to the left/right

Shift -> Speed up

Development Team

  • Antoine THIBERVILLE
  • Benjamin TROUVAT

Game Artists

  • Tiihiva FARNHAM
  • Parisea TEKURARERE

  • Nicolas YOTEAU
  • Thomas BAUDOU
